machinevision-desc: Interfaces with internal and external machine vision service providers and stores and serves results.
machinevision-machineaidedtagging-intro: Review suggested tags of [[c:Commons:Depicts|depicted objects]] in images. Only user-confirmed tags are added to images. For more information, check out the [[c:Commons:Structured_data/Computer-aided_tagging|project page]] and [[c:Commons_talk:Structured_data/Computer-aided_tagging|give feedback]] on how to make this tool more helpful!
machinevision-machineaidedtagging-licens: CC0 license for tag contributions – By clicking "publish", you agree to the [[wmf:Terms_of_Use|terms of use]], and you irrevocably agree to release your contribution under the [https://creativecommons.org/publicdomain/zero/1.0/ Creative Commons CC0 License].
machinevision-login-message: Please [{{fullurl:{{#Special:UserLogin}}|returnto=Special:SuggestedTags}} log in] to see this page and start tagging images. Accurate tags make it easier for all Commons users to find images, and your contributions are appreciated.
machinevision-autoconfirmed-message: Accurate tags make it easier for all Commons users to find images, so please become [[mw:Manual:Autoconfirmed_users|autoconfirmed]], as only autoconfirmed users can use this tool.
machinevision-failure-message: We're sorry, something went wrong. Please check back later or [[c:Commons_talk:Structured_data/Computer-aided_tagging|contact us]].
machinevision-publish-error-message: Something went wrong and tags could not be published. Please try again later.
machinevision-onboarding-dialog-heading: Tag images to make them easier for others to find
machinevision-onboarding-dialog-text: By confirming suggested tags, you can help make images easier to search for. Tags are computer-suggested, but need to be validated by humans to ensure accuracy.
machinevision-onboarding-dialog-disclaim: Only tags that you approve will be added to images.
machinevision-cta-text: Thanks for helping make images more findable for everyone – how about tagging some more?
machinevision-no-uploads-cta-heading: You have no images for review
machinevision-no-uploads-cta-text: How about uploading some images? Or, if you want to help make images more findable for everyone right away, start tagging some popular images now!
tag-computer-aided-tagging-description: Edits created with the Computer-Aided Tagging tool
tag-computer-aided-tagging-revert-descri: Edits reverting one or more revisions created with the Computer-Aided Tagging tool
echo-machinevision-suggestions-ready-not: Suggested tags for {{GENDER:$1|your}} file "$2" are ready for review
Suggested tags for {{GENDER:$1|your}} recent uploads are ready for review

Hello! The images {{GENDER:$1|you}} recently uploaded to Commons have been processed with suggested tags and they are ready for review. Accurate tags make it easier for all Commons users to find {{GENDER:$1|your}} images, so follow the link to review {{GENDER:$1|your}} suggested tags. Only tags confirmed by users will be added as part of the image’s data on Commons. For more information about this tool, please visit the computer-aided tagging tool project page.
Primary link for the suggestions ready echo notification
echo-pref-tooltip-machinevision-suggesti: Notify me when my images have been processed and suggested tags are ready for my review.
